title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Reading Comprehension Skills Through Group Scribble-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify the main ideas and details of various texts.
Through collaborative discussion, learners can analyze the implications of texts and apply critical thinking.
By utilizing digital collaboration tools (Group Scribbles), learners enhance their ability to provide and receive constructive feedback during peer interactions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
